00045 #pragma once
00046 #ifndef AI_PROGRESSHANDLER_H_INC
00047 #define AI_PROGRESSHANDLER_H_INC
00048 
00049 #include "types.h"
00050 
00051 namespace Assimp    {
00052 
00053 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 class ASSIMP_API ProgressHandler
00059 #ifndef SWIG
00060     : public Intern::AllocateFromAssimpHeap
00061 #endif
00062 {
00063 protected:
00065     ProgressHandler () {
00066     }
00067 public:
00069     virtual ~ProgressHandler () {
00070     }
00071 
00072     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00089     virtual bool Update(float percentage = -1.f) = 0;
00090 
00091     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00103     virtual void UpdateFileRead(int currentStep /*= 0*/, int numberOfSteps /*= 0*/) {
00104         float f = numberOfSteps ? currentStep / (float)numberOfSteps : 1.0f;
00105         Update( f * 0.5f );
00106     }
00107 
00108     // -------------------------------------------------------------------
00117     virtual void UpdatePostProcess(int currentStep /*= 0*/, int numberOfSteps /*= 0*/) {
00118         float f = numberOfSteps ? currentStep / (float)numberOfSteps : 1.0f;
00119         Update( f * 0.5f + 0.5f );
00120     }
00121 
00122 }; // !class ProgressHandler
00123 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00124 } // Namespace Assimp
00125 
00126 #endif // AI_PROGRESSHANDLER_H_INC
